title: ElectronJS Kiosk Boilerplate
text: An ElectronJS boilerplate for developing kiosks, digital signage or other human-machine interaction projects. Will also sent in an accompanying article - thanks Will!

title: Electron + VueJS Starter Project
text: Louis wrote an accompanying guide too - thanks Louis!

title: DogTempTexter
text: A Python project to monitor a temperature sensor and send text message alerts using Twilio.
